full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` MYUR MDZAD MGON PO PHYAG DRUG PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(MTHU LDAN BSRUNG MDZAD PO SGRUB THABS 'DI, GUS LDAN DBU MDZAD CHOS RJE BSKUL BA'I NGOR MTSAN LDAN BLA MA GSUNGS BZHIN BRIS PA'I MTHUS, DOM LDAN RNAM MKHYEN GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB SHOG ,'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MI PHYID DANG PA DANG RNAM DPYOD PHUL DU BYUNG BAS CHOS RJE DON GRUB RGYAL MTSAN GYIS NANG TAN CHEN POS BSKUL BA'I NGO MCHOG PAR RNAM GA-YENG KHOR POR RGAS PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA'I BLO BZANG 'PHRIN LAS GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA'O, ,'DI KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
